New Records: Virat Kohli hit his 49th ODI century, equalling Sachin Tendulkar's record.
Virat Kohli surpassed 500 runs in the tournament.
Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja took 5 wickets for 33 runs.
South Africa were bowled out for 83 runs.
Rohit Sharma scored 40 runs off 24 balls.
Mohammed Shami took 2 wickets for 18 runs.
Kuldeep Yadav took 2 wickets for 7 runs.
Marco Jansen was South Africa's highest scorer with 14 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India maintained their 100% record in the group stage.
South Africa had already secured their semi-final place.
Lungi Ngidi suffered an apparent hamstring injury.
